CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Green Valley Homes relative to Sunstone Lofts?
SRP.A: Green Valley Homes is {above} Sunstone Lofts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total vacancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crystal Cove Villas}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total vacancy rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Skyline Towers}.

VE.Q: What is Oceanview Condos's Vacancy Rate in 1969?
VE.A: Oceanview Condos's vacancy rate in 1969 is {3.33} %.

VE.Q: What is Green Valley Homes's Vacancy Rate in 1960?
VE.A: Green Valley Homes's vacancy rate in 1960 is {5.76} %.

VE.Q: What is Skyline Towers's Vacancy Rate in 1970?
VE.A: Skyline Towers's vacancy rate in 1970 is {1.43} %.

VE.Q: What are the vacancy rate of Sunstone Lofts, Skyline Towers, and Oceanview Condos in 1960?
VE.A: Sunstone Lofts's vacancy rate is {5.77} %, Skyline Towers's vacancy rate is {4.11} %, Oceanview Condos's vacancy rate is {4.70} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Vacancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum vacancy rate is {0.88} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Vacancy Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum vacancy rate is {23.07} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Vacancy Rate level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas reached approximately {23.07} % in {1974}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Vacancy Rate level recorded for Crystal Cove Villas?
EVJ.A: Crystal Cove Villas's lowest recorded level is approximately {5.01} % in {1958}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Vacancy Rate?
SC.A: The average total vacancy rate is {36.51} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Vacancy Rate fall between 34.59 and 38.23 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Vacancy Rate go below 32.49 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Vacancy Rate exceed 40.34 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Vacancy Rate in 1958 higher or lower than in 1962?
NC.A: The total vacancy rate in 1958 was {higher} than in 1962.

NC.Q: Between 1960 and 1968, did the total Vacancy Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1964 and 1967?
NC.A: The change in total vacancy rate between 1960 and 1968 was {larger} than between 1964 and 1967.

NC.Q: Between 1965 and 1972, was the average total Vacancy Rate higher or lower than between 1965 and 1969?
NC.A: The average total vacancy rate between 1965 and 1972 was {higher} than between 1965 and 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Vacancy Rate in 1964 higher or lower than in 1970?
NC.A: The total vacancy rate in 1964 was {lower} than in 1970.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crystal Cove Villas} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Skyline Towers, Oceanview Condos, Sunstone Lofts, Green Valley Homes, Ironpeak Residences, Crystal Cove Villas}.
